name: Computer Science and Engineering
shortDescription: Focuses on programming, algorithms, AI and software development.
fullDescription: The CSE department provides in-depth knowledge in Computer Science, covering programming, data structures, algorithms, AI, machine learning, and software engineering. We aim to develop skilled professionals who can innovate in the technology sector.

name: Information Technology
shortDescription: Covers software systems, networking, and information security.
fullDescription: The IT department focuses on software systems, networking, web technologies, and information security. Students gain practical knowledge in developing secure and efficient IT solutions for real-world applications.

name: Electronics and Communication Engineering
shortDescription: Deals with electronics, communication systems, and embedded systems.
fullDescription: ECE department focuses on electronics, communication systems, VLSI design, and embedded systems. Students learn to design and maintain modern electronic and telecommunication systems.

name: Mechanical Engineering
shortDescription: Covers design, manufacturing, and thermodynamics principles.
fullDescription: The Mechanical Engineering department trains students in mechanical design, manufacturing, thermodynamics, and robotics. Emphasis is given on practical skills and industrial applications.

name: Civil Engineering
shortDescription: Focuses on construction, structures, and environmental engineering.
fullDescription: The Civil Engineering department provides expertise in construction techniques, structural analysis, geotechnical engineering, and environmental sustainability. Students gain hands-on experience in designing and managing infrastructure projects.

name: Master of Business Administration
shortDescription: Offers management, finance, and marketing knowledge.
fullDescription: The MBA department trains students in business management, finance, marketing, human resources, and entrepreneurship. Students develop leadership and strategic decision-making skills.
